CriticalFieldNotes: Beautifully renovated library at 54 Olmsted Road. Bright, spacious reading room with large tables and quiet cubicles ideal for focused work. Study rooms available (2 hours/day max, 3x/week). Free WiFi throughout. Part of Westchester Library System. Exceptional environment for deep work sessions. One of the best public libraries in Westchester County.
